body.raw:
<OrderChangeRQ xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="17.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC</Name>
    </Document>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgencySender>
                <Name>xxxxxxxx</Name>
                <IATA_Number>xxxxxxxx</IATA_Number>
                <AgencyID>xxxxxxxx</AgencyID>
                <AgentUser>
                    <AgentUserID>xxxxxxxx</AgentUserID>
                </AgentUser>
            </TravelAgencySender>
        </Sender>
        <Recipient>
            <ORA_Recipient>
                <AirlineID>1G</AirlineID>
            </ORA_Recipient>
        </Recipient>
    </Party>
    <Query>
        <Order>
            <Offer OfferID="OFID1" Owner="1G" ResponseID="1190-6caa989a4ea148b18d68f8427ca05c6a">
                <OfferItem OfferItemID="OFITID_1_1">
                    <PassengerRefs>ADT5</PassengerRefs>
                </OfferItem>
            </Offer>
        </Order>
        <Payments>
            <Payment>
                <Type>VP</Type>
                <Method>
                    <Other>
                        <Remarks>
                            <!-- pnr -->
                            <Remark>xxxxxx</Remark>
                        </Remarks>
                    </Other>
                </Method>
                <Amount Code="HKD">9880</Amount>
            </Payment>
        </Payments>
        <BookingReferences>
            <BookingReference>
                <!-- pnr -->
                <ID>xxxxxx</ID>
                <AirlineID>1G</AirlineID>
            </BookingReference>
        </BookingReferences>
    </Query>
    <DataLists>
        <PassengerList>
            <Passenger PassengerID="ADT5">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                <Birthdate>1993-01-01</Birthdate>
                <Individual>
                    <GivenName>SUNY</GivenName>
                    <Surname>CHANS</Surname>
                </Individual>
                <ContactInfoRef>T1_CONT</ContactInfoRef>
            </Passenger>
        </PassengerList>
        <ContactList>
            <ContactInformation ContactID="T1_CONT">
                <ContactProvided>
                    <EmailAddress>
                        <EmailAddressValue>xxxxxxxx@xx.com</EmailAddressValue>
                    </EmailAddress>
                </ContactProvided>
            </ContactInformation>
        </ContactList>
    </DataLists>
</OrderChangeRQ>

response.name: Demo Response
response.body:
<AirShoppingRS xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="IATA2017.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC Demo</Name>
    </Document>
    <Success/>
    <AirOffers>
        <AirOffer OfferID="DEMO-OFFER-1" Owner="SQ" ResponseID="DEMO-RSP-1">
            <TotalPrice>
                <BaseAmount>
                    <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">450.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
                </BaseAmount>
                <TaxAmounts>
                    <Total>
                        <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">50.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
                    </Total>
                </TaxAmounts>
                <TotalAmount>
                    <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">500.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
                </TotalAmount>
            </TotalPrice>
            <OfferItem OfferItemID="DEMO-OFFER-1-ITEM-1">
                <PassengerRefs>PAX1</PassengerRefs>
                <Services>
                    <Service>
                        <SegmentReference>SEG1</SegmentReference>
                        <Carrier>
                            <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
                        </Carrier>
                    </Service>
                </Services>
            </OfferItem>
        </AirOffer>
    </AirOffers>
    <DataLists>
        <PassengerList>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX1">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
            </Passenger>
        </PassengerList>
        <FlightSegmentList>
            <FlightSegment SegmentKey="SEG1">
                <Departure>
                    <AirportCode>SIN</AirportCode>
                    <Date>2025-11-01</Date>
                    <Time>10:00</Time>
                </Departure>
                <Arrival>
                    <AirportCode>LHR</AirportCode>
                    <Date>2025-11-01</Date>
                    <Time>20:00</Time>
                </Arrival>
                <MarketingCarrier>
                    <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
                    <FlightNumber>308</FlightNumber>
                </MarketingCarrier>
                <OperatingCarrier>
                    <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
                </OperatingCarrier>
                <Equipment>359</Equipment>
                <FlightDuration>PT13H00M</FlightDuration>
            </FlightSegment>
        </FlightSegmentList>
    </DataLists>
</AirShoppingRS>

    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC Demo</Name>
    </Document>
    <Success/>
    <PricedOffer OfferID="DEMO-OFFER-1" Owner="SQ">
        <Price>
            <BaseAmount>
                <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">450.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
            </BaseAmount>
            <TaxAmount>
                <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">50.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
            </TaxAmount>
            <TotalAmount>
                <SimpleCurrencyPrice Code="USD">500.00</SimpleCurrencyPrice>
            </TotalAmount>
        </Price>
    </PricedOffer>
</OfferPriceRS>

<OrderCreateRQ xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="IATA2017.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC</Name>
    </Document>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgencySender>
                <Name>xxxxxxxx</Name>
                <IATA_Number>xxxxxxxx</IATA_Number>
                <AgencyID>xxxxxxxx</AgencyID>
                <AgentUser>
                    <AgentUserID>xxxxxxxx</AgentUserID>
                </AgentUser>
            </TravelAgencySender>
        </Sender>
        <Recipient>
            <ORA_Recipient>
                <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
            </ORA_Recipient>
        </Recipient>
    </Party>
    <Query>
        <Order>
            <Offer OfferID="SP2F-15170427882835151971-1" Owner="SQ" ResponseID="SP2F-15170427882835151971">
                <OfferItem OfferItemID="SP2F-15170427882835151971-1-1">
                    <PassengerRefs>PAX1 PAX2</PassengerRefs>
                </OfferItem>
                <OfferItem OfferItemID="SP2F-15170427882835151971-1-P2">
                    <PassengerRefs>PAX3</PassengerRefs>
                </OfferItem>
            </Offer>
        </Order>
        <DataLists>
            <PassengerList>
                <Passenger PassengerID="PAX1">
                    <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                    <Birthdate>1988-02-11</Birthdate>
                    <Individual>
                        <Gender>Male</Gender>
                        <NameTitle>Mr</NameTitle>
                        <GivenName>lu</GivenName>
                        <Surname>li</Surname>
                    </Individual>
                    <ContactInfoRef>PAX1_CONT</ContactInfoRef>
                </Passenger>
                <Passenger PassengerID="PAX2">
                    <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                    <Birthdate>1986-07-19</Birthdate>
                    <Individual>
                        <Gender>Male</Gender>
                        <NameTitle>Mr</NameTitle>
                        <GivenName>fang</GivenName>
                        <Surname>zhang</Surname>
                    </Individual>
                </Passenger>
                <Passenger PassengerID="PAX3">
                    <PTC>CHD</PTC>
                    <Birthdate>2018-03-15</Birthdate>
                    <Individual>
                        <Gender>Male</Gender>
                        <NameTitle>Mstr</NameTitle>
                        <GivenName>zi</GivenName>
                        <Surname>qian</Surname>
                    </Individual>
                </Passenger>
            </PassengerList>
            <ContactList>
                <ContactInformation ContactID="PAX1_CONT">
                    <ContactProvided>
                        <EmailAddress>
                            <EmailAddressValue>xxxxxxxx</EmailAddressValue>
                        </EmailAddress>
                    </ContactProvided>
                    <ContactProvided>
                        <Phone>
                            <Label>Mobile</Label>
                            <CountryDialingCode>852</CountryDialingCode>
                            <PhoneNumber>xxxxxxxx</PhoneNumber>
                        </Phone>
                    </ContactProvided>
                </ContactInformation>
            </ContactList>
        </DataLists>
    </Query>
</OrderCreateRQ>

<OrderReshopRQ xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="17.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC</Name>
    </Document>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgencySender>
                <Name>xxxxxxxx</Name>
                <IATA_Number>xxxxxxxx</IATA_Number>
                <AgencyID>xxxxxxxx</AgencyID>
                <AgentUser>
                    <AgentUserID>xxxxxxxx</AgentUserID>
                </AgentUser>
            </TravelAgencySender>
        </Sender>
        <Recipient>
            <ORA_Recipient>
                <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
            </ORA_Recipient>
        </Recipient>
    </Party>
    <Query>
        <OrderID>N20230522130xxxxxxxx</OrderID>
        <Reshop>
            <OrderServicing>
                <Add>
                    <Qualifier>
                        <ExistingOrderQualifier>
                            <OrderKeys>
                                <OrderID Owner="SQ">N20230522130xxxxxxxx</OrderID>
                            </OrderKeys>
                            <PassengerReferences>PAX2 PAX3 PAX4</PassengerReferences>
                        </ExistingOrderQualifier>
                    </Qualifier>
                </Add>
            </OrderServicing>
        </Reshop>
    </Query>
    <DataLists>
        <PassengerList>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX2">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
            </Passenger>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX3">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
            </Passenger>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX4">
                <PTC>CHD</PTC>
            </Passenger>
        </PassengerList>
    </DataLists>
</OrderReshopRQ>

<OrderChangeRQ xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="17.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC</Name>
    </Document>
    <Party>
        <Sender>
            <TravelAgencySender>
                <Name>xxxxxxxx</Name>
                <IATA_Number>xxxxxxxx</IATA_Number>
                <AgencyID>xxxxxxxx</AgencyID>
                <AgentUser>
                    <AgentUserID>xxxxxxxx</AgentUserID>
                </AgentUser>
            </TravelAgencySender>
        </Sender>
        <Recipient>
            <ORA_Recipient>
                <AirlineID>SQ</AirlineID>
            </ORA_Recipient>
        </Recipient>
    </Party>
    <Query>
        <OrderID Owner="SQ">N20230522130xxxxxxxx</OrderID>
        <AcceptRepricedOrder>
            <ResponseID>1262-1e14eafe70884b9eafe5c9805xxxxxxxx</ResponseID>
        </AcceptRepricedOrder>
        <Payments>
            <Payment>
                <Type>VP</Type>
                <Method>
                    <Other>
                        <Remarks>
                            <Remark>订单pnr(6位数)</Remark>
                        </Remarks>
                    </Other>
                </Method>
                <Amount Code="CNY">6068</Amount>
            </Payment>
        </Payments>
    </Query>
    <DataLists>
        <PassengerList>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX2">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                <Birthdate>1988-02-11</Birthdate>
                <Individual>
                    <NameTitle>MR</NameTitle>
                    <GivenName>LU</GivenName>
                    <Surname>LI</Surname>
                </Individual>
                <ContactInfoRef>T1_CONT</ContactInfoRef>
            </Passenger>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX3">
                <PTC>ADT</PTC>
                <Birthdate>1986-07-19</Birthdate>
                <Individual>
                    <NameTitle>MR</NameTitle>
                    <GivenName>FANG</GivenName>
                    <Surname>ZHANG</Surname>
                </Individual>
            </Passenger>
            <Passenger PassengerID="PAX4">
                <PTC>CHD</PTC>
                <Birthdate>2018-03-15</Birthdate>
                <Individual>
                    <NameTitle>MSTR</NameTitle>
                    <GivenName>ZI</GivenName>
                    <Surname>QIAN</Surname>
                </Individual>
            </Passenger>
        </PassengerList>
        <ContactList>
            <ContactInformation ContactID="T1_CONT">
                <ContactProvided>
                    <EmailAddress>
                        <EmailAddressValue>xxxxxxxx@163.com</EmailAddressValue>
                    </EmailAddress>
                </ContactProvided>
            </ContactInformation>
        </ContactList>
    </DataLists>
</OrderChangeRQ>

header.description: 取消未支付订单，action参数是cancel，已出票订单作废，参数是void，已出票订单Refund，参数是refund

response.name: Demo Response

header.description: 取消未支付订单，action参数是cancel，已出票订单作废，参数是void，已出票订单Refund，参数是refund

response.body:
<OrderCancelRS xmlns="http://www.iata.org/IATA/EDIST/2017.2" Version="IATA2017.2" PrimaryLangID="EN">
    <Document>
        <Name>TravelNDC Demo</Name>
    </Document>
    <Success/>
    <Response>
        <Order OrderID="ORDER-DEMO-1" Owner="SQ" Status="Cancelled"/>
    </Response>
</OrderCancelRS>
